House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00083
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONSTITUTING AN ADMINISTRATIVE CAPITAL CITY PLANNING COMMISSION FOR THE PURPOSE OF STUDYING THE FEASIBILITY OF RELOCATING THE CAPITAL AND SEAT OF GOVERNMENT OF THE PHILIPPINES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Administrative Capital City Planning Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Envisions to create an Administrative Capital City Planning Commission to lead the development of a comprehensive plan to relocate the government agencies and establish an administrative capital city outside Metro Manila.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BENITEZ, ALFREDO "ALBEE" B.
